description:
Victoria and David Beckham have one gorgeous family!维多利亚和贝克汉姆这幸福的一家子！

The fashion designer took to Instagram on Saturday to celebrate her and David's 16th wedding anniversary with a sweet family photo.周六，维多利亚这位时尚设计师在Instagram上传了一张甜蜜的全家福，庆祝他和贝克汉姆结婚16周年。

In the new picture, David and Victoria smile at the camera as they pose with their four children, Brooklyn, Cruz, Romeo, and Harper. Victoria captioned the photo, "Happy anniversary, I love u so much x I'm so proud of our beautiful family x."照片里，贝克汉姆和维多利亚对着镜头微笑，四个孩子Brooklyn, Cruz, Romeo, and Harper也跟着凹造型。维多利亚照片下标注：“周年快乐，我爱你们，你们是我的骄傲！”

The couple tied the knot on July 4, 1999, at Luttrellstown Castle in Dublin, Ireland. Since then, their love story just seems to keep getting better and better. And after welcoming their four beautiful kids, the family has shared so many swoon-worthy moments over the years.1999年7月4日，这一对眷侣在都柏林的路特尔斯顿城堡喜结良缘。而婚后的爱情故事也愈发甜蜜。在迎来他们的第四个孩子之后，这一家人给我们分享了不计其数的幸福瞬间。

  • 老板凭啥提拔你：如何得到老板赏识
  • 新概念英语第一册Lesson 1 Excuse me
  • 2015上半年网络流行语双语版出炉啦！
  • 你敢走吗？世界最长最高玻璃桥亮相中国

title: 转眼16周年 贝克汉姆全家福秀甜蜜
